name: Fief: the Medieval Manor Simulation
description:
Start in a rogue-like 2D turn-based game in which you play the role of a most lowly knight who has inherited a fief through some fortunate circumstances. However, the land appears to be nothing more than a tangle of wild country awaiting a strong-willed individual to turn it into a thriving village manor. Build your manor house and attract peasants to work for you in exchange for your protection. Eventually your village grows to a city and then a kingdom. Begin your great dynasty, destined to rule the known world.

The game is in early alpha with only survival game-play implemented.

More information on the game's website: http://www.arboreantears.com
